Cryptocurrency
Bitcoin Trading Fund

Berkshire Bitcoin Fund was fund launched in 2019 and is amongst the top performing investment funds ever across all asset classes with an inception to date return of +28,227.1% as of October 2022 Lowry Bitcoin Fund is a passive tracker of Bitcoin. it effectively functions as a Bitcoin ETF. The fund is formally structured as a Cayman hedge fund and is available to both U.S and non U.S investors. The Fund provides quick, safe, and efficient access to Bitcoin while removing the burden of buying and safekeeping coins. Berkshire Bitcoin Fund offers investors daily liquidity and a low fee structure. Our trading services are facilitated by machine-learned predictive algorithms. These algorithms notify us of when to buy, sell, dump or HODL. This algorithm has been trained with years of data, ranging from chart and price information for over 1200 cryptocurrencies, to news stories and key influence social media activities. Over years of in-depth research, we have perfected this system, and have opened it to the public sector for investments through our platform. Leverage this opportunity to tap into the next level of technology.

OUR PORTFOLIO

We trade over 1,200 crypto-coins, ICOs and tokens on our partner exchange platforms in order to yield outstanding return rates. Our cryptocurrency database is ever expanding, and we always put out the feelers in order to rake in the earliest information so we can stay ahead of the market. We aim to be first to receive any crypto coin-related news, so we can move and cash out before other traders get wind of the news. The early bird gets the worm! Clients can invest in Berkshire Commodities, trusting in it is safe and secure, its several levels of cyber-security, and its reliable business model which yields steady profits for the investor, company, and partner platforms all at the same time!

MARKET INDICATORS

The company maintains a database of all profitable crypto-coins to trade, and regularly updates this database. This database of market information collected over the past few years allows the company to continously improve and fine-tune the software and investment interface. Our data supply engines are continuously updating our trading machines with relevant information. Once received, our servers sift through petabytes of information highlight key pointers, which are fed to our trade-placing machines & Ai. After trades are placed, profits and losses are calculated, and the results are analyzed for the impact of the acquired information. This in turn notifies the information machines about specific data sets to curate and supply. This infinite transfer loop happens over the course of a few seconds in real-time. With these tools, Berkshire Consulting aims to stay ahead of the curve for the foreseeable future.
